body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"What is the remainder when "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2015!"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is divided by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2017"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"?"}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Wilson told us,"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" 2016! \equiv -1 \pmod{2017} "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"or,"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" 2016! \equiv 2016 \pmod{2017} "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"or,"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" 2015! \equiv 1 \pmod{2017} "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"           [Dividing both sides by"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2016"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"]"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The remainder is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{1}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":",when "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2015!"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is divided by 2017."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We know from Wilson's theorem that "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(p-2)! "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\equiv"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" 1 (mod p)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2017 is prime so 2015! will be congruent to 1 (mod 2017)."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Directly follows from wilsons theorem and the fact that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2016=-1 \mod 2017"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Hence,"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{1}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\large 64\sin { \theta  } +64\cos { \theta  } -8\sec { \theta  } -8\csc { \theta  } +\tan { \theta  } +\cot { \theta  } ."}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1f  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\theta =\frac 12 \sin ^{ -1 }\left(\frac 14\right) "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", find the value of the expression above."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":""}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"    "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"heading","attrs":[{"level":6}],"content":[{"type":"text","text":"More questions related to KVPY?"}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"From the given  condition, we can say "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" 2 sin \theta cos \theta = \frac14 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Simplifying the given equation,
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" 64(sin \theta + cos \theta) - 8 \frac{(sin \theta + cos \theta )}{\frac{1}{8}}+ \frac{sin^2  \theta + cos^2  \theta}{\frac18} "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" 64(sin \theta + cos \theta) - 64(sin \theta + cos \theta) +8 "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
